weather_info:
Based on the provided data, the weather advice for today is as follows:

The temperature is 26.76°C, but it feels like 29.54°C due to the humidity. The sky is mostly cloudy with 75% cloud coverage. The visibility is good at 10,000 meters. The wind speed is 4.12 m/s coming from the north-northeast (10 degrees). The air pressure is at 1005 hPa.

Considering these conditions, it is recommended to dress comfortably and be prepared for the possibility of rain. Carry an umbrella or raincoat if necessary. Enjoy your day!
